About Us <--> GlassByte is a software development start-up company headquartered in Dublin, Ireland. Our small, ambitious team strives to create innovative and useful software for computing platforms. For more apps or business enquiries, visit our website!\nhttp://www.glassbyte.com/

Welcome to iompar The all-round transportation app for Ireland. Use app in Irish Gaelic What\'s your name? Your name What\'s Your Fare Type? This can be changed later under settings Payment Preference I pay using cash I pay using Leap Leap Information Leap cards make transport quicker, easier, and cheaper.\n\nMake sure to register it online so you can access your balance here. Cash is slower and more expensive to use in comparison to a Leap card.\n\nPurchase a Leap card for €5 and save money on journeys. What now? iompar helps you track your public transport and expenditures intelligently.\n\nMonitor your spending and never miss that journey again.
